    queue := flag.String("q", "", "The name of the queue")
    waitTime := flag.Int("w", 10, "How long, in seconds, to wait for long polling")
    flag.Parse()

    if *queue == "" {
        fmt.Println("You must supply a queue name (-q QUEUE")
        return
    }

    if *waitTime < 1 {
        *waitTime = 1
    }

    if *waitTime > 20 {
        *waitTime = 20
    }
